text.text: During an incredibly stressful time, Kirsty’s knowledge & compassion supported us to find the right aged care for our family. We are very appreciative of her guidance & care for all family members. She made a difficult process much easier due to her extensive  knowledge of processes & the system. We highly recommend Pathways in Care, for all families dealing with these difficult & often heart breaking situations.

originalText.text: During an incredibly stressful time, Kirsty’s knowledge & compassion supported us to find the right aged care for our family. We are very appreciative of her guidance & care for all family members. She made a difficult process much easier due to her extensive  knowledge of processes & the system. We highly recommend Pathways in Care, for all families dealing with these difficult & often heart breaking situations.

text.text: Kirsty was able to help us find a placement for both of my in-laws in a timely manner. Kirsty had a very pleasant nature and made the placement experience a more smooth process, taking away the stress at a difficult time for us. I would highly recommend Kirsty to help with the placement process.
